name: Syphon Filter 2
summary: Syphon Filter 2 is a third-person shooter stealth video game developed by Eidetic and published by 989 Studios for PlayStation. It is the second game in the Syphon Filter series.
info:
• 中文名: 虹吸战士2
  • 开发: Bend Studio
  • 发行: Sony Interactive Entertainment
  • 平台: PS
  • 游戏类型: TPS
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2000年3月14日
